description: The AWS::S3::StorageLens resource is an Amazon S3 resource type that you can use to create Storage Lens configurations.

Id.description: The ID that identifies the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.
Id.markdownDescription:
The ID that identifies the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.
